message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I think you'll really love it, and I'm willing to start the conversation with a price of $9,500. What do you think?

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you starting the conversation. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm not quite ready to pay $9,500. I'm willing to offer $9,000 for it. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was really hoping to get closer to the price I was thinking of. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $9,250. What do you think?
